amendment.description: To amend title 4 United States Code, to declare English as the national language of the United States and to promote the patriotic integration of prospective US citizens.

action.text: Amendment SA 4064 proposed by Senator Inhofe.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4064 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 35. Record Vote Number: 131.
